Package com.pacman.map

Class Map

java.lang.Object
com.pacman.map.Map
public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
Map class represents the maze loaded from file for specific level. Map uses 1 to store a tile being wall, and 0 as blank tile. Such data is stored in 2-dimensional array.

  • Method Details

    • loadFromFile

      public void loadFromFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
      Loads map from file Also sets value of positions list, which we will use to store coordinates of balls. As for now we don't use it and just temporarily print it on the screen.
      Parameters:
      fileName - - name of file, that stores the level

    • draw

      public void draw​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draws map. Drawing map means to draw all of the map tiles being a wall. Should be called in GamePanel.paint()
      Parameters:
      g - - Graphic context to draw on

    • getTile

      public int getTile​(int x, int y)
      Method name could also be get mapArray Returns the tile (0 OR 1) with given pos in GRIDs

    • getTileCords

      Return GRID pos from given px pos.
